title: Who Framed Klaris Cliff?
description: People used to call them 'friends' and said how they were good for your brain. And then a day came when all that changed . . . when they became our enemy.Now, anyone found harbouring a rogue imaginary person is in for the Cosh, an operation that fries your imagination and zaps whatever's in there, out of existence.That's why I wish Klaris Cliff had never shown up. And why I know that proving her innocence is the last hope I have of saving myself.Funny, quirky, and intriguing. This is a gripping read.
author: Nikki Sheehan
